settings.promptsDescription: Configure prompt used in the project, supporting global prompts and scenario-specific prompts.
settings.globalPromptPlaceholder: Enter global prompt that will serve as the base prompt for all scenarios
settings.labelPromptPlaceholder: Enter prompt for question labeling (not supported currently)
settings.domainTreePromptPlaceholder: Enter prompt for building domain tree
settings.cleanPromptPlaceholder: Enter custom prompt for data cleaning
settings.title: Settings
settings.textSplitDescription: Adjust the text split length range
settings.splitTypeMarkdownDesc: Automatically split the text according to the titles in the document, maintaining semantic integrity. It is suitable for Markdown documents with a clear structure.
settings.splitTypeRecursiveDesc: Recursively attempt multiple levels of delimiters (configurable). First, use delimiters with higher priority, and then use secondary delimiters. It is suitable for complex documents.
settings.splitTypeTextDesc: Split the text according to the specified delimiter (configurable), and then combine it according to the specified length. It is suitable for ordinary text files.
settings.splitTypeTokenDesc: Block based on the number of Tokens (not the number of characters).
settings.splitTypeCodeDesc: Intelligently block according to the syntax structure of different programming languages, avoiding splitting at places with incomplete syntax.
settings.splitTypeCustomDesc: Split documents based on custom symbols. The separator will be discarded and the split text chunks will not be affected by chunk size.
settings.codeLanguageHelper: Select the programming language for smarter code splitting based on language syntax.
settings.separatorHelper:
Separator used for splitting text, e.g. 

 for blank lines
settings.customSeparatorHelper: Custom separator used for splitting text, e.g. --- or ===
settings.separatorsHelper: Comma-separated list of separators in priority order
settings.questionGenDescription: Set the maximum length for generated questions
settings.concurrencyLimitHelper: Limit the number of tasks for generating questions and generating datasets simultaneously.
settings.minerUHelper: MinerU Token is valid for only 14 days. Please replace the Token in time
settings.visionConcurrencyLimit: Concurrency limit for custom large-scale vision models

settings.multiTurnScenarioHelper: Describe the conversation scenario or context
settings.multiTurnRoleAHelper: Description of the first participant in the conversation
settings.multiTurnRoleBHelper: Description of the second participant in the conversation

textSplit.mineruWebPlatformDesc: Capable of identifying complex PDF files, including formulas and charts (Requires redirecting to another website)

textSplit.mineruLocalSelected: Selected to use MinerU Local for parsing PDFs
textSplit.customVisionModelDesc: Capable of identifying complex PDF files, including formulas and charts (Requires adding vision model configuration to the model configuration)

textSplit.defaultSelected: Selected to use the default built-in strategy for parsing PDFs
